description.value:
You have made a pact with a fiend from the lower planes of existence, a being whose aims are evil, even if you strive against those aims. Such beings desire the corruption or destruction of all things, ultimately including you. Fiends powerful enough to forge a pact include demon lords such as Demogorgon, Orcus, Fraz'Urb-luu, and Baphomet; archdevils such as Asmodeus, Dispater, Mephistopheles, and Belial; pit fiends and balors that are especially mighty; and ultroloths and other lords of the yugoloths.

Expanded Spell List

The Fiend lets you choose from an expanded list of spells when you learn a warlock spell. The following spells are added to the warlock spell list for you.

Fiend Expanded Spells
Spell LevelSpells
1st@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.5SuJewoa1CRWaj1F]{Burning Hands}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.arzCrMRgcNiQuh43]{Command}
2nd@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.zwGsAv6kmwzYGhh3]{Blindness/Deafness}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.7u2obDvuvtZBkTfq]{Scorching Ray}
3rd@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.ztgcdrWPshKRpFd0]{Fireball}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.TwlD4PLcltv7Xh7j]{Stinking Cloud}
4th@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.avD5XUtkBPQQR97c]{Fire Shield}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.X3DrXgxjwI2dvkD6]{Wall of Fire}
5th@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.5e1xTohkzqFqbYH4]{Flame Strike}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.SLxA9QhrggTz0taU]{Hallow}
